languages.text: {n}Улыбка Лорд-инквизитора выглядит немного хищно.{/n} "Давайте я продемонстрирую, как это работает. В вашей свите находится не получившая санкции {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Терры{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкерша{/g}, что, как мы оба знаем, есть страшнейшая угроза и богохульство против законов {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Мне ведом этот секрет, но... я совсем не сержусь. И она живет дальше, полезная псайкерша Идира Тласс".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лорд-инквизитор чуть улыбается, в его лице есть что-то хищное.{/n} "Вы ведь тоже пользуетесь услугами этой псайкерши... Идира... Тласс, если не ошибаюсь? Надеюсь, ее услуги вам полезны".

languages.text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor smiles ominously.{/n} "Let me demonstrate how it works. In your retinue, there is a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} who is yet to receive {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}'s sanction, which, as we both know, is a grave threat and a blasphemy to the laws of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I am aware of this secret, but... I'm not displeased in the slightest. And so she lives on, your handy psyker Idira Tlass."
languages.original_text: {n}Улыбка Лорд-инквизитора выглядит немного хищно.{/n} "Давайте я продемонстрирую, как это работает. В вашей свите находится не получившая санкции {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Терры{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкерша{/g}, что, как мы оба знаем, есть страшнейшая угроза и богохульство против законов {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Мне ведом этот секрет, но... я совсем не сержусь. И она живет дальше, полезная псайкерша Идира Тласс".

traits.locale_text: {n}Xavier's smile looks somewhat predatory.{/n} "Let me demonstrate how it works. In your retinue, there is a psyker who is yet to receive Terra's sanction, which, as we both know, is a grave threat and a blasphemy to the laws of the Imperium. I am aware of this secret, but... I'm not displeased in the slightest. And so she lives on, your handy psyker Idira Tlass."

{n}Xavier's smile looks somewhat predatory.{/n} "Let me demonstrate how it works. In your retinue, there is a psyker who is yet to receive Terra's sanction, which, as we both know, is a grave threat and a blasphemy to the laws of the Imperium. I am aware of this secret, but... I'm not displeased in the slightest. And so she lives on, your handy psyker Idira Tlass."

In your retinue, there is a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} who is yet to receive {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}'s sanction, which, as we both know, is a grave threat and a blasphemy to the laws of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I am aware of this secret, but... I'm not displeased in the slightest. And so she lives on, your handy psyker Idira Tlass."

languages.text: {n}ロード・インクィジターは邪悪そうに笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「どのように使うのか見せてやろう。お前の仲間には、まだ{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}地球{/g}の認可を受けていない{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}がいるな。分かっているな、それは深刻な脅威であり、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}法への冒涜だ。この秘密に気づいているが…少しも不快に思わぬ。まだ生きているのだろう、お前のお抱え異能者、イディラ・タラースは」
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor smiles ominously.{/n} "Let me demonstrate how it works. In your retinue, there is a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} who is yet to receive {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}'s sanction, which, as we both know, is a grave threat and a blasphemy to the laws of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I am aware of this secret, but... I'm not displeased in the slightest. And so she lives on, your handy psyker Idira Tlass."

traits.locale_text: {n}ロード・インクィジターは邪悪そうに笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「どのように使うのか見せてやろう。お前の仲間には、まだ{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}地球{/g}の認可を受けていない{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}がいるな。分かっているな、それは深刻な脅威であり、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}法への冒涜だ。この秘密に気づいているが…少しも不快に思わぬ。まだ生きているのだろう、お前のお抱え異能者、イディラ・タラースは」

languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's smile looks somewhat predatory.{/n} "Let me demonstrate how it works. In your retinue, there is a psyker who is yet to receive Terra's sanction, which, as we both know, is a grave threat and a blasphemy to the laws of the Imperium. I am aware of this secret, but... I'm not displeased in the slightest. And so she lives on, your handy psyker Idira Tlass."

languages.text: {n}大审判官露出了不祥的笑容。{/n}“这么说吧，你的随行人员之中有一位{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}，尚未得到{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}泰拉{/g}的授权，而我们都知道，这是对{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}法律的严重威胁与亵渎。不过，虽然我知道这个秘密，但我并未对此感到任何不快……正因如此，你那位得力的灵能者伊迪拉·特拉斯，才能活到现在。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor smiles ominously.{/n} "Let me demonstrate how it works. In your retinue, there is a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} who is yet to receive {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}'s sanction, which, as we both know, is a grave threat and a blasphemy to the laws of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I am aware of this secret, but... I'm not displeased in the slightest. And so she lives on, your handy psyker Idira Tlass."

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长露出了带着掠食意味的笑容。{/n}“这么说吧，你的随行人员之中有一位{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}，尚未得到{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}泰拉{/g}的授权，而我们都知道，这是对{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}法律的严重威胁与亵渎。不过，虽然我知道这个秘密，但我并未对此感到任何不快……正因如此，你那位得力的灵能者伊迪拉·特拉斯，才能活到现在。”

languages.text: {n}El Lord Inquisidor te dirige una sonrisa ominosa.{/n} «Permítame que le demuestre cómo funciona esto. En su séquito hay una {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquica{/g} que aún no ha recibido la autorización de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, algo que tanto usted como yo sabemos que es una grave amenaza y una blasfemia contra las leyes del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Soy consciente de este secreto, pero... no me disgusta en absoluto. Y, por lo tanto, su práctica psíquica Idira Tlass puede vivir».
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor smiles ominously.{/n} "Let me demonstrate how it works. In your retinue, there is a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} who is yet to receive {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}'s sanction, which, as we both know, is a grave threat and a blasphemy to the laws of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I am aware of this secret, but... I'm not displeased in the slightest. And so she lives on, your handy psyker Idira Tlass."

traits.locale_text: {n}La sonrisa del Lord Inquisidor adopta un aspecto un tanto depredador.{/n} «Permítame que le demuestre cómo funciona esto. En su séquito hay una {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquica{/g} que aún no ha recibido la autorización de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, algo que tanto usted como yo sabemos que es una grave amenaza y una blasfemia contra las leyes del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Soy consciente de este secreto, pero... no me disgusta en absoluto. Y, por lo tanto, su práctica psíquica Idira Tlass puede vivir».

languages.text: {n}Le sourire du seigneur inquisiteur se fait soudain carnassier.{/n} « Laissez-moi vous donner un exemple. Vous avez dans votre entourage une {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} qui n'a pas encore reçu son assermentation de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, ce qui, vous le savez aussi bien que moi, représente une menace et une grave infraction aux lois de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Je suis parfaitement au courant, et pourtant... je ne suis absolument pas contrarié. C'est pourquoi Idira Tlass, votre petite psyker, peut continuer à vivre. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor smiles ominously.{/n} "Let me demonstrate how it works. In your retinue, there is a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} who is yet to receive {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}'s sanction, which, as we both know, is a grave threat and a blasphemy to the laws of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I am aware of this secret, but... I'm not displeased in the slightest. And so she lives on, your handy psyker Idira Tlass."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sourire du seigneur inquisiteur semble soudainement carnassier.{/n} « Laissez-moi vous donner un exemple. Vous avez dans votre entourage une {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} qui n'a pas encore reçu son assermentation de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, ce qui, vous le savez aussi bien que moi, représente une menace et une grave infraction aux lois de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Je suis parfaitement au courant, et pourtant... je ne suis absolument pas contrarié. C'est pourquoi Idira Tlass, votre petite psyker, peut continuer à vivre. »

languages.text: {n}Der Großinquisitor lächelt unheilvoll.{/n} "Ich erkläre Euch kurz, wie es funktioniert. In Eurem Gefolge gibt es eine {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psionikerin{/g}, die noch nicht von {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} sanktioniert wurde, was, wie wir beide wissen, eine schwere Bedrohung darstellt und eine Blasphemie gegenüber den Gesetzen des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}. Ich weiß um dieses Geheimnis, aber ... es missfällt mir nicht im Geringsten. Und darum lebt sie weiter, Eure nützliche Psionikerin Idira Tlass."
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor smiles ominously.{/n} "Let me demonstrate how it works. In your retinue, there is a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} who is yet to receive {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}'s sanction, which, as we both know, is a grave threat and a blasphemy to the laws of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I am aware of this secret, but... I'm not displeased in the slightest. And so she lives on, your handy psyker Idira Tlass."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Lächeln des Großinquisitors hat etwas Raubtierhaftes an sich.{/n} "Ich erkläre Euch kurz, wie es funktioniert. In Eurem Gefolge gibt es eine {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psionikerin{/g}, die noch nicht von {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} sanktioniert wurde, was, wie wir beide wissen, eine schwere Bedrohung darstellt und eine Blasphemie gegenüber den Gesetzen des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}. Ich weiß um dieses Geheimnis, aber ... es missfällt mir nicht im Geringsten. Und darum lebt sie weiter, Eure nützliche Psionikerin Idira Tlass."

languages.text: {n}Lord Engizisyoncu, uğursuz bir tavırla gülümsüyor.{/n} "Durumu bir örnekle açıklayayım. Maiyetinde henüz {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra'nın{/g} onayını almamış bir {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g} bulunuyor, bu da {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} kanunlarınca hayati bir tehdit ve dine aykırılıktır. Bu sırrın bilincindeyim ancak hiç de hoşnutsuz kalmış değilim. İşte bu yüzden her işine koşan ruhsezerin İdira Tlass, hâlâ hayatta."
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor smiles ominously.{/n} "Let me demonstrate how it works. In your retinue, there is a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} who is yet to receive {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}'s sanction, which, as we both know, is a grave threat and a blasphemy to the laws of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I am aware of this secret, but... I'm not displeased in the slightest. And so she lives on, your handy psyker Idira Tlass."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lord Engizisyoncu uğursuz bir tavırla gülümsüyor.{/n} "Durumu bir örnekle açıklayayım. Maiyetinde henüz {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}'nın onayını almamış bir {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g} bulunuyor ve bu da {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} kanunlarınca hayati bir tehdit ve bir kâfirliktir. Bu sırrın bilincindeyim ancak hiç de hoşnutsuz kalmış durumda değilim. Bu nedenle de o her işine koşan ruhsezerin İdira Tlass, yaşamını sürdürüyor."
